isv.sap.payment.service

Class DefaultPaymentTransactionService

  • java.lang.Object
    • isv.sap.payment.service.DefaultPaymentTransactionService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PaymentTransactionService
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultB2bPaymentTransactionService

    public class DefaultPaymentTransactionService
extends java.lang.Object
implements PaymentTransactionService
    Encapsulates the default implementation of PaymentTransactionService interface.

    Implements transaction retrieval logic - for latest and accepted transactions.

        Description copied from interface: PaymentTransactionService
